text_block_list.text:
"Code" :『Moon Viewing』. Zenno Rob Roy's "destination" is the 
『Autumn Senior Triple Crown』. Consulting "space sign"――
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text: This "up quark" will provide "support".
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text: Sphira! Unisan's "support rations" will "enrich" Zenno Rob Roy's 『training』!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
This is a『promise』to give everlasting "support". 
Zenno Rob Roy's 『future』will surely be "GRSS".
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
『Thank you』, Unisan! 
"Afterglow", Zenno Rob Roy is "MOLT"!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
――Perfect. 
"TACS" is certain.
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text: Rob Roy-saaan, your senpai's calling for youuu~
text_block_list.name: Classmate Umamusume

text_block_list.text: ――Uni-san? Is something the matter...?
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: "GIVU".
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text: Er... Is this a book of racing tactics...?
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
"GIVU".  The star map of the『Tenno Sho』..."Collected" data is 
"all green". ...In this.
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
This is... data on the Umamusume running the the Autumn Tenno 
Sho...? But, um, why...?
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
......Reaction "dust" confirmed. ...Still "insufficient"? 
Reassessment scheduled. 
――"FUNV", Zenno Rob Roy.
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
Uh, I... Huh? 
.......W-what did she want, I wonder...
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
Huff, huff, phew... 
...Hmm? Uni-san?
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: "GIVU". 『Nourishment』.
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text: Eh!? Th-thank you very much...!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
...Um, did you... come all the way here to give me these...? 
D-does that mean I made you wait a long time!? I'm sorry!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
......? 
"Signal"... "Unwanted"?
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
No, of course not!! 
I, uh, I'll take them, thank you...!?
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
Ah――! 
Uni-san...?
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
(Why did she go so far as to wait for me...? 
It feels like she's worrying about me more than normal――）
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
(Oh... Did she notice how much I'm struggling to get in shape for 
the Autumn Senior Triple Crown...?)
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: Howdy~! Can we join you, Kris S~? ...Oh, you look busy. Is that a training plan?
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text: ――For Rob Roy.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
Oh, yeah, I've been seeing the two of you train together lately. 
I take it you've been coaching her?
text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki

text_block_list.text:
――I recieved―― a request. 
She aims―― to win―― a GI.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text: Please, train with me!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
Kris S-san, you've achieved incredible things in the Autumn GIs. 
You've blazed a trail on the path I hope to walk.
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
I want to learn from you. 
――I want to win this autumn, no matter what.
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: ――Understood.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text: Nurturing future generations―― Is another way―― to contribute―― to Japanese racing. So―― I will accomplish―― this mission―― without fail.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text: Well~... So, you're giving her Sargeant Kris S's All-In Boot Camp? Sounds like fun!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text: I know! Y'all should join us at the Moon Viewing Social! I think it's a good idea! It's just the thing you need!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text:
So you're going to invite Rob Roy? 
All right, then, just give me a heads-up when you make it official.
text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki

text_block_list.text:
Of course! Kris S, let's go invite her right away! 
And while we're there, let me train with y'all!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
